components.copy: KX Tech Club: How to communicate in photos

text: Introducing KX Tech Club, a new series from Samsung KX that delves into all the useful tips, tricks and hacks for an array of activities over a series of tech clubs, in partnership with Rebel Book Club.

In Session 3, Communicating in Photos, Rebel Book Club, The Photography Movement, adventurer turned photographer WheresMollie and our Samsung KX team discuss the brave new world of digital photography. The three-part series looks at how photography has enabled and encouraged them to compose, capture and share images that tell their stories and how to maximise taking their shots through the Galaxy S21

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 1 - How to communicate in photos by Rebel Book Club

text: In episode 1, Ben from Rebel Book Club shares his personal story as he welcomed his daughter Rosie 13 weeks ago. Ben discusses how photography has been a way to capture and journal his new-born babyâ€™s life, allowing them to stay connected to his family during the pandemic.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 2 - How to communicate in photos by WheresMollie

text: In episode 2, Mollie tells us how she began documenting her travels and adventures through digital photography, which in turn allowed her to gain a following and propel her career to the next level. Mollie discusses how digital photography provides a platform for inspiration to get people outdoors, talking, sharing, shooting and adventuring.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 3 - How to communicate in photos by The Photography Movement

text: In the final episode, The Photography Movement discuss mind mapping and photography. Through incredible art pieces by Joel Robison, The Photography Movement discuss how everyday life journaling has become therapy for individuals, allowing them to express their highs and lows through their creations. Our Samsung KX team also discuss how to use maximise your Samsung device, using it as a tool to experiment and share as much as possible.
